tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi my name is Kiran Kaviti I went to Sunil sir for scaphoid fracture treatment, many orthopedics from top hospitals asked me to go for surgery but Sunil sir cured me without surgery, ***** *** ** **** ********** ** ********** highly qualified and very kind hearted. Patiently listens to the problems. Others orthopedics simply say do exercises but sir will personally show you how to do the exercise.
As I trust only him I again visited Sunil sir for my knee pain, he checked in his ways and said there is no problem he gave me medicines for 15days, now my knee is fine. Honestly I suggest everyone who have any orthopedic issues mist visit this doctor once.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** *** ***** He is cheerful and listens to your complaints patiently and makes you feel really comfortable. He operated me for a fracture, which was successful. I recovered and resumed day to day activities very soon, much to the surprise of people around me. He and his team are extremely approachable and friendly. His team goes the extra mile by answering queries even offline, which I found really helpful. Cheers to the medical fraternity for their service especially during COVID times.

Iam walking now without any hassle ness.  Iam recommending him as a best among others as for as orthopaedic problems are concerned.  Thanking you 
B. Ananndarao ** **** ****** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Extremly talented and friendly doctor . It's really important during times of treatment that your doctor gives you courage and confidence to go through the treatment process . Dr Sunil is extremely talented and receives his patients with utmost care . My mother got her femure fracture surgery done with Dr Sunil and she's recovered well .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
As I fell off the bike and my ACL was torn, I saw some of Dr.Sunil 's videos in YouTube and strongly thought that I should get operated by this doctor garu.
I visited Dr.Sunil dachepally garu in March 2022 for ACL reconstruction. 
Sir explained the problem and the need for the surgery.He gives us strength to overcome the fear of surgery.I underwent surgery on April 7th and right now iam doing good.I strongly recommend Dr.Sunil for any kind of surgery* ****** ** ****** * ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The doc was very friendly and supportive, everything was awesome!! 
One issue is the management, they don’t have time sense, no time management, the doctor was down to earth whereas his PA was rude!! I would rather visit him in Yashoda hospital than in this clinic. The clinic sucks!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I did book the Dr. Sunil from Practo but my mom was following him in YouTube. I wonder why she is watching more videos about him. Here is the answer,He is excellent in explaining the issue, gave the confidence, helpful information, great patience, no rush in talking gave enough time to talk and listen. My mom was super happy and me too. 

Highly recommended doctor Dr. Sunil Dachecpalli.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had undergone revision ACL and meniscus repair surgery. Best part was, I was able to walk with confidence 2-3 days post surgery, compared to about 3-4 weeks in my previous ACL surgery(5 years back). Minimal pain and excellent post surgery medication and physio protocol of the dr is helping me in my recovery. Optimistic of the recovery path, cant wait to get back to my sports.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.Sunil was a great person. I consulted him for an opinion and he was very patient in hearing my entire incident and then suggesting me a better choice explaining the reason behind his opinion.
Many doctors consulted before Sunil sir simply recommend surgery irrespective of explaining the need for it. However Dr.Sunil gave me a right advice with proper justification. 

Thankyou Sir !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: **** ****** clear all my doubts, with patience and advised me for better fast recovery of problem, *** ** ** *** **** * **** ****** *  **** **** good human being as I said I am working  in Indian army he straight told his assistant to refund my op charges  which ever I paid... Thanks for the concern doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** *** ********** He listened patiently and calmly while I told him the history of the issue and symptoms. reply_text: Thank you Kakuli for your kind words. We aim to continue the same care that we provided in London for almost 10years. Have a good day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor was friendly and had enough patience to understand the problem. Suggested necessary precautionary action items. 

In Addition, Dr Sravani ( physio ) was helpful as well. She was enough kind to us and friendly . Thanks to her as well who helped me during off hours to identify about medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Here I am giving a brief history of my problem and the solution given by dr. I met with an accident in Oct 2020 and got to know have to go to ACL reconstruction for my right knee...which was per performed in NOV 2020 in private hospital by in experienced not worthy doctor which leads to inability to walk or bending of my knee.it took nearly five months to proper walk or bend my knee.
Then suddenly my knee was swollen with heavy pain ....I visited the same hospital with same surgeon he again performed a surgery by saying I got infection in my knee.. after a month still i didn't got relief than I got to know about DR . Sunil Dachepalli ** *** **** *** * ***** * his nature and friendliness gave me confidence that my problem can be cured. He is a highly professional with vast  knowledge. He treated my problem very well.
I am very much happy. I surely suggest him for any problems related orthopaedic. ** ** *** ** *** *** *********** ****** ** ****** 
Thank you DR. SUNIL DACHEPALLI.

review:
Dr.Sunil Dachepalli is very friendly receiving of the patients and with gentle and humble with smily talking with the patients by knowing their ailments. 

He simply with high latest knowledge orientation he educate and explain the patient the Real Problem and properly guide the patient what to DO and when to DO the treatment.
I noticed he is very energetic and never show restlessness on his face from morning 8 a.m. to night 8 p.m. with the patients.

He is a Very Nice Doctor and he is asset to the Yashoda do have one of the such kind of Doctors in Place.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have consulted this doctor for Plantar fasciitis, he has given treatment with PRP (Platelet Rich Plasma) injection. Initially i suffered alot with this issue but after taking prp and doing continuous physical excercises it got cured. I would definitely recommend Dr. Sunil Dachapally.
Doctor is very nice friendly and cool, explains problem clearly but wait time is very very high. Our appointment was scheduled at 8.45 pm and we were done at 11.30 PM.
